# WKAudioFilePlayerItemStatus

**Enumeration**

Constants that represent the status of a player item.

## Declaration

```swift
enum WKAudioFilePlayerItemStatus
```

## Statuses

- **WKAudioFilePlayerItemStatus.unknown**: The item’s status is unknown.
- **WKAudioFilePlayerItemStatus.readyToPlay**: The item is ready to play.
- **WKAudioFilePlayerItemStatus.failed**: The item can’t be played.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: The item is ready to play.
items.name: WKAudioFilePlayerItemStatus.readyToPlay
